app.title: On OpenStreetMap
app.desc:
OpenStreetMap is an open, global map used by people around the world to navigate and find local businesses.
It's easy and free to add your business to the map!

step1.title: Location
step1.desc: Start by telling us where your business is located.
step1.fail: We couldn't find your address. Try searching for your street or city without the address.
step1.nohousenumber: Warning: we were unable to find your house number. The position on the map could be inaccurate, please drag the marker on the exact position of your business. If the buildings are not currently shown on the map, you could switch to the 'satellite' view using the button at the top right corner of the map.

step2.title: Details
step2.desc: We found it! Now fill in the details about your business.
step2.catalt: If you don't find a category that suits you, please add further details here.
step2.addressalt: Help us by filling the complete address (housenumber, post code) or improving the previous one
step2.name: Name
step2.delivery_covid: Is there a delivery service during COVID-19 emergency?
step2.delivery_covid_description: Delivery service details during COVID-19 emergency
step2.takeaway_covid: Is there a takeaway service during COVID-19 emergency?
step2.takeaway_covid_description: Takeaway service details during COVID-19 emergency
step2.wheelmodal:
Unrestricted access

  • The entrance is stepless
  • All the rooms is stepless
  • The bathroom (if applicable) is accessible and cabin is wide enough to fit a wheelchair next to the toilet

Partial access

  • The entrance has a step but not higher than 7 cm / 3 inch ('width of a hand')
  • The most important rooms are accessible by wheelchair
  • The bathroom (if applicable) is not accessible

No unrestricted access

  • The entrance has a step higher than 7 cm / 3 inch
  • The important rooms are not accessible
  • The bathroom (if applicable) is not accessible

Unknown access

If you aren't sure or don't have information, choose this option.

step3.title: Done
step3.row1: Thanks! An OpenStreetMap volunteer will add your data to the map soon.
step3.row2: You can see the newly created note and watch for updates at this link:
step3.row3: Did you know you can add your own data to the map and skip the wait? It's very easy to get started editing OpenStreetMap in your browser.
step3.row4: Do you want to add another note?

messages.success: Found it! Click and drag the marker on your business place position, so you'll be ready to add more details.
messages.manualPosition: You have activated the marker! Click and drag it on your business place position, so you'll be ready to add more details.
messages.credits: An open source project developed by the worldwide OpenStreetMap community . Contribute to this project on GitHub.
